definitions.title: n. pr. m.
definitions.body: et trib. Manasseh (interpr. Ge 41:51 as Pi. causat. √II. [[נשׁה]] q.v.);—´[[מ]] Ge 46:20 +; [[מְנַשֶָּׁה]] Ge 41:51 + (on Ju Jdg 18:30 v. [[משֶׁה]]); c. art. (strangely), ´[[הַמְַ]] Jos 1:12 + 10 t. (v. infr.); LXX Man(n)assh;—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: Manasseh, eldest son of Joseph Ge 41:51, Ge 48:1, Ge 48:13, Ge 48:14, Ge 48:14, Ge 48:17, Ge 48:20, Ge 48:20, also Ge 50:23 (father of Machir; all E), Ge 46:20, Ge 48:5 (both P).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of tribe, oft. + Ephraim (v. [[אֶפְרַיִם]]): (I) the part W. of Jordan: † a. ´[[בְּנֵי מ]] Jos 16:9, Jos 17:2 a (´[[בני־מ]] [[הַנּוֹתָרִים]]), v:Jos 17:2 b, v:Jos 17:6, v:Jos 17:12 (all JE), 1Ch 7:29, 1Ch 9:3 (´[[בְּנֵי אֶפְרַיִם וּמ]]; Jos 13:29 v. infr.); b. ´[[מ]] alone, Jos 17:5, Jos 17:8, Jos 17:8, Jos 17:9 b, Jos 17:11, Jos 17:17, De 34:2 (´[[אֶרֶץ אֶפְרַיִם וּמ]]; all JE), 2Ch 30:10 (id.), Jos 16:4, Jos 17:7, Jos 17:9 a, Jos 17:10 (all P), also appar. De 33:17 (poem), Ju Jdg 1:27, Jdg 6:15, Jdg 6:35, Jdg 7:23, Is 9:20, Is 9:20, Ps 80:3 + 10 t. Chr; †g. ´[[מַטֵּה מ]] 1Ch 6:55; ´[[חֲחִי מַטֵּה מ]] Jos 21:6, Jos 21:25, 1Ch 12:32 (van d. H v:31); ´[[מַחֲחִית מַטֵּה חֲחִי מ]] 1Ch 6:46 (but on text v. Kit); [[וְאֶפְרַיִם]] ´[[שְׁנֵי מַטּוֹת מ]] Jos 14:4 (P); †d. ´[[חֲחִי שֵׁבֶט מ]] 1Ch 27:20; c. art. ´[[הַשֵּׁבֶט הַמְַ]] Jos 13:7 (D). † (2) of Manasseh E. of Jordan; a. ´[[בְּנֵי מ]] Jos 22:30, Jos 22:31 (P); b. ´[[מ]] alone, Ju Jdg 11:29 (distinctly of territory), Jdg 12:4 (but on text v. GFM), Ps 60:9 = Ps 108:9; ´[[חֲחִי הַמ]] 1Ch 27:21; g. ´[[מַטֵּה מ]] Jos 17:1 Jos 20:8 (both P), 1Ch 6:47; ´[[חֲחִי מַטֵּה מ]] Jos 22:1 (D), Nu 34:14, Jos 21:5, Jos 21:27 (all P), 1Ch 6:56; [[חֲחִי מַטֵּה]] ´[[בְּנֵי מ]] Jos 13:29 (P); d. ´[[חֲחִי שֵׁבֶט מ]] De 3:13 (D), Jos 13:29, Jos 22:13, Jos 22:15 (all P), 1Ch 15:18, 1Ch 15:23, 1Ch 15:26, 1Ch 12:38 (van d. H v:37); [[בֶּן־יוֹסֵף]] ´[[חֲחִי שֵׁבֶט מ]] Nu 32:33 (P); c. art. ´[[חֲחִי שֵׁבֶט הַמְַ]] Jos 1:12, Jos 4:12, Jos 12:6, Jos 18:7, Jos 22:1, Jos 22:7 (all D), Jos 22:9, Jos 22:10, Jos 22:11, Jos 22:21 (all P). Here belong also (chiefly) reff. to ´[[מ]] as father of Machir (cf. Ge 50:23 supr.): † Nu 27:1, Nu 32:39, Nu 32:40, Nu 36:1, Jos 13:31, Jos 17:1, Jos 17:3 (all P), 1Ch 7:14, 1Ch 7:17; and of Jair De 3:14 (D), Nu 32:41 (P), 1Ki 4:13 (cf. [[מָכִיר]],[[יׇאִיר ]]). † (3) of undivided tribe (never ´[[שֵׁבֶט מ]]): a. ´[[בְּנֵי מ]] Nu 1:34, Nu 2:20, Nu 7:54, Nu 26:29, Nu 36:12 (all P); b. ´[[מ]] alone, Nu 1:10, Nu 26:28, Nu 26:34, Nu 27:1 b (all P), Ez Eze 48:4, Eze 48:5; g. ´[[מַטֵּה מ]] Nu 1:35, Nu 2:20, Nu 13:11, ´[[מַטֵּה בְּנֵי מ]] Nu 10:23, Nu 34:13 (all P).
son of Hezekiah, and king of Judah (As. Menasê, Minsê Schr:COT 2Ki 21:1);—2Ki 20:21, 2Ki 21:1 + 9 t. K, 12 t. Ch, Je 15:4. †
two who had taken strange wives:
